logic: For each year during the crediting period, emissions are calculated as specified in paragraph a and paragraph b below and lower of the two values is used (a) Actual monitored amount of methane captured and destroyed by the project activity. (b) The methane emissions calculated ex ante using the amount of the waste or raw material that would decay anaerobically in the absence of the project activity, with the most recent IPCC tier 2 approach

logic: the fraction of time in which the gas is combusted in the flare, multiplied by the efficiency of the flaring process, shall be monitored.
summary: the fraction of time in which the gas is combusted in the flare, multiplied by the efficiency of the flaring process, shall be monitored.
